sentences.sContent: 10,000 men had volunteered by the end of September; thereafter, approximately 1,000 men enlisted each month.
sentences.sCn: 到9月底时已有10,000人志愿参军，此后，每个月差不多有1,000人应征入伍。

sentences.sContent: Sophie was born in France, but shortly thereafter her family moved to the United States.
sentences.sCn: 索菲出生在法国，但不久以后她全家就移居到了美国。

remMethod.val: there(那) + after(后来) → 那之后 → 此后

trans.tranOther: after a particular event or time
